name: @ticketfi/apollo-router
description: Apollo Router configuration for TicketFi production deployment

scripts.dev: docker build -t apollo-router-local . && docker run -it --env-file .env -p 4000:4000 apollo-router-local
scripts.doppler:pull: pnpm doppler:pull:dev && pnpm doppler:pull:stg && pnpm doppler:pull:prd
scripts.doppler:pull:dev: doppler secrets download --project ticketfi-router --config dev --format env-no-quotes --no-file > .env.dev
scripts.doppler:pull:stg: doppler secrets download --project ticketfi-router --config stg --format env-no-quotes --no-file > .env.stg
scripts.doppler:pull:prd: doppler secrets download --project ticketfi-router --config prd --format env-no-quotes --no-file > .env.prd
scripts.doppler:pull:local: doppler secrets download --project ticketfi-router --config dev --format env-no-quotes --no-file > .env
scripts.doppler:push: pnpm doppler:push:dev && pnpm doppler:push:stg && pnpm doppler:push:prd
scripts.doppler:status: doppler secrets --project ticketfi-router --config dev --json | jq 'keys | length' && doppler secrets --project ticketfi-router --config stg --json | jq 'keys | length' && doppler secrets --project ticketfi-router --config prd --json | jq 'keys | length'
scripts.doppler:status:dev: doppler secrets --project ticketfi-router --config dev --json | jq 'keys | sort'
scripts.doppler:status:stg: doppler secrets --project ticketfi-router --config stg --json | jq 'keys | sort'
scripts.doppler:status:prd: doppler secrets --project ticketfi-router --config prd --json | jq 'keys | sort'

author: TicketFi
